intro.p: Let's look at top national fast food restaurant chains. The name of the chain and the type of resaurants it has are listed in the table below.

Make sure to show your computations and to give reasons ( in words) about how you came up with your answers. Round your answer to four decimal places. Failure to show all computations or incorrect rounding may results in a score of "not mastered".

content.p: Calculate the totals for the cells labeled A, B, and C in the table.
What is the probability that a randomly selected location was a {{type1}}?
What is the probability that a randomly selected location was a {{place1}} or a {{place2}}?
Of the {{place3}} locations, what is the probability that a randomly selected location was {{type2}} location?
What is the probability that a randomly selected {{type3}} location was NOT a {{place4}}?
